page.title: 11CAERWYS WALK ctd.
page.content: We came out of the woods at the top of the hill where there was a large field which was being cut by the farmer for silage.Over the field we saw a Sparrow Hawk hovering over a creature probably disturbed by the tractor.To the right of us was the ruins of a farm "Trefraith".The next field brought no luck at all,Gareth Parry lost his fountain pen and Mark Draper lost his 65p dinner money. We crossed three fields all growing either silage or hay,we passed a Tumulus and joined a narrow lane and proceeded along it in a north westerly direction.The fields on either side were either silage,hay or pasture.We saw cattle,sheep and horses.
